title: 守ってあげます[Mamotte Agemasu]
description: Onizuka Takashi, leader of the strongest delinquent group in the Kantou region, is willing to become a monster for Hiragi Kotome, whom he fell in love with at first sight.Includes two oneshots: Kai Chiyou Omakase (I'll Leave It To You, President)Naishiyono Xmas (Secret Xmas)
author: Ayano Saijou
